channel.title: Walk to item before picking it up
channel.description:
I was wondering, how did you do that? I mean, you click an item, it walks to it, and it picks it up. Not like you walk there and have to click it AGAIN and it will pick it up. I had found a tut long time agoi, but i los it /cry....... :( :( :( :( :( :( :(
So anyone can help me?
Also, how do you make it so that you walk to an object before you perform the action?
thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2007, 04:51:02 PM[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 08:50:38 AM[/size][hr]bump
